title: Past Simple Form (with all verbs except 'be')

parts.value: (hear) a new song on the radio.
(understand) during the class, but now he doesn't understand.
(give) my mother a CD for Christmas.
(tell) me that he lived in Toronto.
(stand) under a tree to shelter from the rain.
(sing) too much last night - I have a sore throat!
(take) three hours to drive to Paris.
(get) a new bike for her birthday.
(pay) the bill before leaving the restaurant.
(wear) her new coat to the party.
(sit) on the old chair and it broke.
(not/work) in the bank at the same time as me.
(Sally and Victoria/go) to a cafe at lunchtime?
(you/feel) okay on the first day of your new job?

exercises.title: Past Simple All Forms Mixed Exercise 1

parts.value: (I / be / at the cinema last night)

answers: I was at the cinema last night.

parts.value: (we / be / in a cafe when you called)?

answers: Were we in a cafe when you called?

parts.value: (she / be / a teacher when she was young)

answers: She was a teacher when she was young.
They were late for the interview.

parts.value: (she / not / be my wife at the time)

answers: She wasn't my wife at the time.
She was not my wife at the time.

exercises.title: Past Simple All Forms Mixed Exercise 2

parts.value: (get on) the bus in the centre of the city.

exercises.title: Past Simple All Forms Mixed Exercise 3
Past Simple All Forms Mixed Exercise 4
